data.name: M1101
data.value: This field is marked as required. Please fill in the field and try again.
data.comment: Field is required.

data.name: M1102
data.value: This field contains either a ' or a ; These characters are considered invalid and should be removed.
data.comment: Formatting pertaining to a Title Check

data.name: M1103
data.value: This field contains characters that are not letters. This field only only accepts letters.
data.comment: Formatting pertaining to a Name Check

data.name: M1104
data.value: This field contains characters other than letters and numbers. This field only accepts letters, numbers, '.', '-', '/', ' ', and '+'
data.comment: Formatting pertaining to an Item ID Check

data.name: M1105
data.value: This field only accepts a specific format. Please make sure the field resembles (999) 999-999
data.comment: Formatting pertaining to a Phone number check

data.name: M1106
data.value: This field only accepts a specific format. Please make sure the field resembles A5A 5A5
data.comment: Formatting pertaining to a Postal Code Check

data.name: M1107
data.value: This field only accepts a specific format. Please make sure the field resembles abc@example.com
data.comment: Formatting pertaining to an Email check

data.name: M1108
data.value: This field only accepts a number that has no decimal places or characters like $ or ,
data.comment: Formatting of an Integer

data.name: M2101
data.value: Failed to load object schema from database. Please contact administrator. Message:
data.comment: Database failed to provide schema for object.

data.name: M2102
data.value: Database interaction failed. Please contact system administrator. Message:
data.comment: Database failed to execute query

data.name: M3201
data.value: You are about to add a new object to the system. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: Adding a new object to system

data.name: M3202
data.value: You are about to save your modifications to this object. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: Modifying an existing object.

data.name: M3203
data.value: This object may already exist in the system. Please confirm the following fields are unique:
data.comment: Object may already exist.

data.name: M3204
data.value: You are about to cancel adding a new object. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: Cancelling a new object

data.name: M3205
data.value: You are about to cancel the modifications made to the object. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: Cancelling mods to an existing object.

data.name: M3206
data.value: This item will have a Quantity of 0 if you commit this transaction. This will cause the average cost to be exactly the same as the Latest cost and may provide inaccurate reporting.
data.comment: in relation to having less Quantity then what is being checked out.

data.name: M3207
data.value: This tab is considered a transactional tab and requires that you either Save or Cancel you changes to the current object before selecting a new tab.
data.comment: Related to Complex Transaction Tabs.

data.name: M4201
data.value: You are about to replace the accounts current password with a new random password. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: Generating new password for site account.

data.name: M4202
data.value: You are about to grant access to this site via the web portal. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: Granting access to Site via web portal

data.name: M4203
data.value: You are about to remove access to this site via the web portal. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: Removing access to Site via web portal
